Rulings.Edison: ●If you have 7 or more cards in your hand after returning The Wicked Worm Beast to your hand, you must discard cards until you have 6 cards.
Rulings.Tengu: ●If you have 7 or more cards in your hand after returning The Wicked Worm Beast to your hand, you must discard cards until you have 6 cards.
Rulings.Goat: “The Wicked Worm Beast” will not return to the player’s hand if it is not face up on the field during the End Phase.
